metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Disable Slide Update' is set to Enabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Disable Slide Update' is set to Enabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Default file format' is set to Enabled (PowerPoint Presentation (*pptx))
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Default file format' is set to Enabled (PowerPoint Presentation (*pptx))

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' is set to Enabled (Open in Protected View (Unchecked))
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' is set to Enabled (Open in Protected View (Unchecked))

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' is set to Enabled (Open in Protected View (Unchecked))
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' is set to Enabled (Open in Protected View (Unchecked))

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Do not open from the Internet zone in Protected View' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Do not open from the Internet zone in Protected View' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off Protected View for attachments opened from Outlook' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off Protected View for attachments opened from Outlook' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Do not open files in unsafe locations in Protected View' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Do not open files in unsafe locations in Protected View' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Trusted Locations on The Network' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Trusted Locations on The Network' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Disable all trusted locations' is set to Enabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Disable all trusted locations' is set to Enabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Disable Trust Bar Notification for Unsigned Application Add-ins and Block Them' is set to Enable
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Disable Trust Bar Notification for Unsigned Application Add-ins and Block Them' is set to Enable

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Trust Access to Visual Basic Project' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Trust Access to Visual Basic Project' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Require That Application Add-ins are Signed by Trusted Publisher' is set to Enabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Require That Application Add-ins are Signed by Trusted Publisher' is set to Enabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'VBA Macro Notification Settings' is set to Enabled (Disable all Except Digitally Signed)
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'VBA Macro Notification Settings' is set to Enabled (Disable all Except Digitally Signed)

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' is set to Enabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' is set to Enabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Scan Encrypted Macros in PowerPoint Open XML Presentations' is set to Enabled (Scan Encrypted Macros)
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Scan Encrypted Macros in PowerPoint Open XML Presentations' is set to Enabled (Scan Encrypted Macros)

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Run Programs' is set to Enabled (Disable (Don't Run Any Programs))
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Run Programs' is set to Enabled (Disable (Don't Run Any Programs))

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Turn Off File Validation' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Turn Off File Validation' is set to Disabled

metadata.title: (L1) Ensure 'Unblock Automatic Download of Linked Images' is set to Disabled
metadata.description: (L1) Ensure 'Unblock Automatic Download of Linked Images' is set to Disabled
